Paragraph: 14,[32][33][34][35][36] In 2008 , we reported the synthesis of a copolymer between the DTP donor and the DTBT acceptor.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| ------------ |
| copolymer     |
| DTP donor    |
| DTBT acceptor |
| 2008         |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| ------------ |
| copolymer     |
| DTP donor    |
| DTBT acceptor |
| 2008 (year)  |

Note: In this context, a copolymer is a type of material or polymer that consists of two or more different types of monomers, so it can be considered a material property.
